name: Into the Lab
description:
The neighborhood Mad Scientist has been using human test subjects in an attempt to perfect his magnum opus: a performance-enhancing super drug! However, his impatience has led him to perform one last extreme experiment. As his latest victim, you're dropped into a massive chamber along with his other subjects and told to use any means necessary to survive. It's a fight to the death to see which version of the scientist's formula has created the optimal man!

-Unlock movement abilities such as wallrunning and grappling as your insanity and bloodlust increases!

-Try to withstand the intense visual side-effects of the drug coursing through you!

-When your bloodlust dies down, the drug's fatal effects take hold: that's a Game Over!

Credits:

Joey Bush: AI Programming, General Programming, Cutscene Camera Work and Voiceover as "Igor"

David Hoff: Programming Aid, General Design Aid, Cutscene Direction Aid

Keegan McQuin: Player Programming, General Programming, 2D Art, 3D Art, UI Design, Cutscene Actor and Voiceover as "Mad Scientist"

Sage Stamper: Gameplay Design, 3D Art Design Aid, Cutscene Direction Aid


Made for the Texas Aggies Game Developers Spring 2022 Semester Game Jam!
